display of pomp; ostentation.
any event, happening that is to follow the present time; a future event.
the behavior or act of a coquette; flirting; coquetry.
any race, game, debate, etc. in which individuals or teams compete with one another to determine the best among a group of persons; a contest; a vying.
the act of revenging; vengeance; revenge.
to see or know beforehand; to foresee.
= ಮೇಗುದೋಱು.
to make something look brilliant or better.
to display one's wealth, status, merit, etc. in an ostentatious manner.
to behave imperiously, arrogantly.
to behave in a coquetish manner; to flirt.
to contest; to vie for superemacy.
to deal with dishonestly for one's own gain; to commit a fraud; to cheat; to deceive.
to talk to deceive.
any of a series of rapid, heavy breaths, as from exertion; gasp; pant.
to breathe rapidly and heavily; gasp, as from running fast; to pant.
= ಮೇಗುಸಿರಿಡು.
